name: Safe Beats - Demo
description:
Early demo of our school project. Demo project uses songs made by DM DOKURO. Link to his SoundCloud is here:  https://soundcloud.com/dm-dokuro

Safe Beats is a 2D platformer, where you and the enemies are synced to music beat. You play as Clef, who has to restore the harmony by destroying the evil viruses within the music. 

Randomly generated levels and more content will be added to the game later.

Team:

  • Joonaxii - Lead Programmer || https://joonaxii.itch.io/
  • Me, Hippopotaska - Programmer
  • Banda - Programmer || https://bandaw.itch.io
  • Dreamwave - Lead Artist || https://itch.io/profile/1dreamwave
  • Watteripatteri - Artist
  • Medic Robot - Artist
